video.headline: Aldridge plays both ends with block and mid-range jumper
video.caption: LaMarcus Aldridge blocks Michael Kidd-Gilchrist and then works the mid-range game with a jumper on the other end.
video.description: LaMarcus Aldridge blocks Michael Kidd-Gilchrist and then works the mid-range game with a jumper on the other end.

tracking.trackingName: NBA One-Play (Aldridge plays both ends with block and mid-range jumper) 2017/11/25 ESHEET

video.headline: Embiid takes the contact to set up potential three-point play
video.caption: Joel Embiid draws the foul on Bismack Biyombo and makes the layup anyway.
video.description: Joel Embiid draws the foul on Bismack Biyombo and makes the layup anyway.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One Play (Embiid takes the contact to set up potential three-point play) 2017/11/25 ESHEET

video.headline: McCollum hits clutch jumper to seal the game
video.caption: CJ McCollum pulls up with Otto Porter Jr. in his face and knocks it down. The Trail Blazers go on to beat the Wizards 108-105.
video.description: CJ McCollum pulls up with Otto Porter Jr. in his face and knocks it down. The Trail Blazers go on to beat the Wizards 108-105.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (McCollum hits clutch jumper to seal the game) 2017/11/25 ESHEET

video.headline: Raptors dominate Hawks
video.caption: Kyle Lowry records a double-double of 15 points and 13 rebounds as seven Toronto players score in double digits en route to a 112-78 win.
video.description: Kyle Lowry records a double-double of 15 points and 13 rebounds as seven Toronto players score in double digits en route to a 112-78 win.

video.headline: Horford shows off his low-post moves
video.caption: Al Horford backs in Thaddeus Young and fakes him out before scoring off glass for two of his 12 points in the third quarter.
video.description: Al Horford backs in Thaddeus Young and fakes him out before scoring off glass for two of his 12 points in the third quarter.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Horford shows off his low-post moves) 2017/11/25 ESHEET

video.headline: Paul connects with Harden for alley-oop
video.caption: Chris Paul lobs a pass to James Harden who tips it in for the bucket.
video.description: Chris Paul lobs a pass to James Harden who tips it in for the bucket.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Paul connects with Harden for alley-oop) 2017/11/25 ESHEET
